The most lamentable Romaine tragedie of Titus Andronicus As it was plaide by the right honourable the Earle of Darbie, Earl of Pembrooke, and Earl of Sussex their seruants. Titus Andronicus Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
[78] p.
Printed by Iohn Danter, and are to be sold by Edward White & Thomas Millington, at the little North doore of Paules at the signe of the Gunne, London : 1594.
By William Shakespeare. Signatures: A⁴(-A1) B-K⁴. Some print slightly faded and some pages stained. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
